title: Milo Ventimiglia to Play Evel Knievel in USA Limited Series
text:
Photo: David Livingston/Getty Images

Milo Ventimiglia has been a vroom-vroom motorcycle boy from way back. Since Gilmore Girls, he’s been integrating his love of bikes with his craft. And now that he’ll be playing Evel Knievel, the two are in perfect sync. According to Variety, Evel will be a limited series centering on Knievel’s jump of Snake River Canyon. Link Knievel, Ventimiglia is known for his love of Harley Davidson motorcycles. “I’ve always been a fan of Harley-Davidson motorcycles and when I started riding, about 12-13 years ago, I knew that the first bike I wanted to buy was going to be a Harley-Davidson,” Ventimiglia told Heavy in April. “Then, one bike turned into two bikes, turned into three or four.” Ventimiglia is executive producing under his DiVide Pictures shingle. It’s the first scripted series based on Knievel’s life, and the biggest thing to happen for motorcycle stunts since Hot Rod.
description: Milo Ventimiglia is playing Evel Knievel for USA in a limited series. The show, titled Evel, will cover Knievel’s attempted jump of the Snake River Canyon. Though Milo and Evel love Harley Davidson motorcycles, the Canyon jump was in a rocket.
